comments: Equivalently, numerator of Prod_{n>=1} prime(n)/(prime(n)-1) (cf. A038110). - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 17 2015
references: G. H. Hardy and E. M. Wright, An Introduction to the Theory of Numbers, 5th ed., Oxford Univ. Press, 1979, th. 429

formula: a(n) = A002110(n) / gcd( A005867(n), A002110(n) ).A038110(n) / a(n) ~ exp( -gamma ) / log( prime(n) ), Mertens's theorem for x = prime(n)= A000040(n).a(n) = A038111(n)/prime(n). - _Vladimir Shevelev_, Jan 10 2014
mathematica: a060753[n_] := Denominator@ Product[EulerPhi@ Prime@ i / Prime@ i, {i, #}] & /@ Range[0, n]; a060753[19] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jan 10 2015 *)
author: _Frank Ellermann_, Apr 23 2001
